mapper.select: SELECT PLACE_ID, NAME, PHONE, START_TIME, END_TIME, START_AGE, END_AGE, WITH_WHOM, FLOOR, LOCATION, CATEGORY, THEME1, THEME2, THEME3, WEIGHT1, WEIGHT2, WEIGHT3 FROM PLACE WHERE PLACE_ID > 0 ORDER BY PLACE_ID DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PLACE( NAME, PHONE, START_TIME, END_TIME, START_AGE, END_AGE, WITH_WHOM, FLOOR, LOCATION, CATEGORY, THEME1, THEME2, THEME3, WEIGHT1, WEIGHT2, WEIGHT3) VALUES ( #{name}, #{phone}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{startAge}, #{endAge}, #{withWhom}, #{floor}, #{location}, #{category}, #{theme1}, #{theme2}, #{theme3}, #{weight1}, #{weight2}, #{weight3})
mapper.update: UPDATE PLACE SET NAME = #{name}, PHONE = #{phone}, START_TIME = #{startTime}, END_TIME = #{endTime}, START_AGE = #{startAge}, END_AGE = #{endAge}, WITH_WHOM = #{withWhom}, FLOOR = #{floor}, LOCATION = #{location}, CATEGORY = #{category}, THEME1 = #{theme1}, THEME2 = #{theme2}, THEME3 = #{theme3}, WEIGHT1 = #{weight1}, WEIGHT2 = #{weight2}, WEIGHT3 = #{weight3} WHERE PLACE_ID = #{placeId}
